steps.1: add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl
steps.2: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.3: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup
steps.4: Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl
steps.5: Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 2 minutes
steps.6: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper to the bowl
steps.7: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl
steps.8: Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits
steps.9: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl
steps.10: Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed).
steps.11: Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well
